author: info@kalkinemedia.com (EIN Presswire)
title: InventionHome® Product Developer Creates Solar- and Wind-Powered Semi-Truck System for Environmentally Effective Travel
text:
EINPresswire.com/ -- Dennis W. of Las Vegas, NV is the creator of the Quick-Charge Solar Generator Pack, a multifunctional electric generator system for semi-trucks, box trucks, and numerous other land and marine vehicles designed to power the vehicle via solar and wind energy. The system functions in conjunction with the existing power source of the semi-truck while offering renewable power capabilities for vehicle travel. The semi-trailer will be mounted with solar panels on the exterior that deliver solar energy to the truck’s electrical system. A standard 53-foot semi-trailer can accommodate an approximate 1,200-SF solar panel field. At 15 watts / SF, on a sunny day, the solar panels will generate roughly 18 KW of power.
In conjunction with the energy from solar, the wind turbine-generator system will also provide power to the electrical system. It consists of trailer mounted wind turbine-generators, as well as a wind turbine-generator on the front of the truck. As flow into these wind turbines will cause resistance – lack of aerodynamics – each turbine will work in with its own louver system that will open to admit air to the turbines based on truck throttle position. When the truck driver is “off the pedal” the louvers will be open to admit air to the turbines. As the turbine-generators spin, they will generate electricity to supply the electrical system. The turbines mounted on the top-front of the trailer will have their louvers built into the air dam (the spoiler on top of the truck). The trailer bottom mounted wind turbine-generator will have its louver built into the trailer skirt.
The bottom of the trailer includes a battery pack that maintains charge to the electric semi-truck system. There is a plug adapter on the face of the trailer that enables the trailer to be plugged into the truck. All components work in conjunction to develop a consistent renewable energy source for electric semi-truck vehicles. The wind turbines and solar energy can help reduce stops to recharge the vehicle and effectively improve travel times. There is also a 10-300 KV quick charge/backup/emergency/auxiliary generator mounted to the face or under the belly of the trailer for use during emergency need of electrical power. Overall, the system improves charging experiences for the electric semi-truck to reduce frequent stops and minimize travel times.
Over the last few years, the market for electric semi-trucks has been gaining momentum, driven by a combination of environmental concerns, advancements in battery technology, and increased interest from logistics and transportation companies looking to reduce their carbon footprint. Many major automotive manufacturers and new entrants in the electric vehicle (EV) space have announced plans to develop and produce electric semi-trucks. This growing interest indicates a positive trend toward the adoption of electric trucks in the commercial transportation sector. However, range anxiety and the availability of charging infrastructure are important factors influencing the adoption of electric semi-trucks. Advances in battery technology are improving the range of electric trucks, and the development of a robust charging infrastructure is underway to support long-haul operations. The Quick-Charge Solar Generator pack offers several versatile and multifunctional solutions to these issues and would be a significant enhancement to any automotive manufacturer’s current products.
Dennis filed his Utility Patent with the United States Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) and is working closely with
InventionHome, a leading invention licensing firm, to sell or license the patent rights to his Quick-Charge Solar Generator Pack product. Ideal licensing candidates would be U.S. based product manufacturers or distributors looking to further develop and distribute this product innovation.
Companies interested in the Quick-Charge Solar Generator Pack can contact InventionHome at
[[email protected]]https://kalkinemedia.com/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection. Inventors currently looking for assistance in patenting, marketing, or licensing their invention can request information from InventionHome at [[email protected]]https://kalkinemedia.com/cdn-cgi/l/email-protectionor by calling 1-866-844-6512.
About InventionHome®
InventionHome is a leading invention and product licensing firm focused on helping inventors and entrepreneurs through the invention and patent process with the goal of licensing or wholesaling client inventions. For more information, email
[[email protected]]https://kalkinemedia.com/cdn-cgi/l/email-protectionor visit https://www.inventionhome.com.

[#39](c39#c-39) Yo pondria solo las que este de acuerdo el 100x100 del consistorio, porque la ley dice que no se puede poner ninguna no oficial, entiendo que si alguien protesta no se puede poner.
cuidado con abrir la puerta a que los ayuntamientos puedan poner las banderas y mensajes que les de la gana en sus edificios....cuidado con eso.
[#40](c40#c-40) uy si, cuidado, llevamos años poniendo esa bandera en los ayuntamientos y no se ha muerto nadie ni se ha roto España.
Mira es muy fácil. La bandera del alzheimer sirve para dar visibilidad o apoyo a alguien que lo necesite? Si, molesta o hiere a alguien? No
Pues se pone.
El lazo rosa del cáncer sirve para dar visibilidad y apoyo a alguien que lo necesite? Si. Ofende o hiere a alguien? No
Pues se pone.
La bandera arco iris sirve para dar visibilidad o apoyo a alguien que lo necesite? Si. Ofende o hiere a alguien? No
Pues se pone
La bandera del ku kux klan sirve para dar visibilidad o apoyo a alguien que lo necesite? No

Pues no se pone.
Ves? No es muy difícil
[#41](c41#c-41) " uy si, cuidado, llevamos años poniendo esa bandera en los ayuntamientos y no se ha muerto nadie ni se ha roto España."
y? tampoco se rompe si no se pone, cambia la ley entonces, y abre la puerta a banderitas, a ver que pasa.
Igual un ayuntamiento de vox pone una bandera que no te gusta, y entonces que?
"La bandera arco iris sirve para dar visibilidad o apoyo a alguien que lo necesite? Si. Ofende o hiere a alguien? No
Pues se pone"
A mi no me ofende pero estoy en contra de muchas cosas del ideario LGTBI, tu no eres nadie para decir lo que molesta o no molesta, te puedo poner ejemplos de cosas politicas que piden los LGTB que yo me opongo, y la ley me protege, un ayuntamiento no puede usar edificios publicos para campañas politicas. LGTB tiene componente politico, el alzeimer y cancer no, pero te compro el argumento, no se pone ninguna, o se pone la que diga el ayuntamiento, pero entonces APOCHINA cuando ayuntamientos de la derecha pongan las banderitas que les den la gana.
"Ves? No es muy difícil"
SI, si es dificil, la ley tiene que decir lo que vale y lo que no vale, vale poner por ejemplo "refugees welcome"?? vale poner "tourists go home?", vale poner "no al aborto"? vale poner "si al aborto"? quien dice lo que vale o lo que no vale?
LGTB, repito, es un movimiento politico con reivindicaciones politicas, pasate por sus paginas, te puedo poner ejemplos, yo no tengo que tragar con sus consignas. La ley dice que no se pueden poner banderas no oficiales, cambia la ley, y me cuentas que tal cuando los de vox pongan "menas go home"
[#43](c43#c-43) mira , la puerta a poner banderas en el ayuntamiento lleva años abierta. El único problema que ha surgido tras años de poner la bandera LGTBI en ayuntamientos es el que están creando ahora los intolerantes de siempre.
[#22](c22#c-22) lo siento, pero mi brújula moral me impide callar mi boca virtual ante una injusticia aunque la sufra el demonio redivivo.
LA ley dice que no puede haber banderitas de ningun tipo a no ser que sean oficiales.
Es tan complicado cumplir la ley?
[#1](c1#c-1) Desde la perspectiva de Compromís, un poco sí que se podía y todavía no han cambiado el chip.
Cuando el ayuntamiento estaba dirigido por Ribó, este decía que era la casa de la ciudad y la abrió a los vecinos.
https://www.eldiario.es/comunitat-valenciana/valencia-ribo-ayuntamiento-recibira-municipalizara_1_2619733.html
[#10](c10#c-10) si cualquiera cuelga sus mensajes del ayuntamiento, deja de ser representativo de lo que oficialmente se reivindica, por lo que pierde sentido colgar cosas del ayuntamiento para hacer ver que se reivindican. De cajón.
[#7](c7#c-7) Bueno, es pura curiosidad, la gente prefiere arrimarse al protofascismo que a esta izquierda que no le pasa nada, y la gente que la defiende solo sabe soltar frasecillas con mucha sorna pero poco contenido, vamos, lo que solía hacer mayormente la derecha antaño, solo os habeis convertido en otra derecha.
[#4](c4#c-4) Cuando la derecha juega con los derechos adquiridos, al más puro estilo franquista. No van a gobernar en mucho tiempo.

author: NewsBreak Original
title: Massive waves pounding coast
text: Towering waves as high as 33-feet are expected to continue pummeling the California coast into Friday, along with high winds, as a major storm approaches. Even though the strongest band of moisture, expected to bring as much as three-and-a-half inches of rain to North Bay mountains, won't arrive until late Friday afternoon; surging waves, associated with the system have already forced mandatory evacuations at Stinson Beach and in Santa Cruz County. Similar conditions are expected all along the coast. "We are looking at breaking waves at the coast, anywhere from twenty-eight to thirty-three feet. Conditions at the coast are very deadly, very dangerous, so we are encouraging people to stay away from the water, give it a healthy distance and just, don't go near it if you can," said Alexis Clouser, a National Weather Service Meteorologist. The danger is real. "We have seen some reports today of waves crashing up along roads that are immediate to the coast, we've had a couple of reports of roadway flooding as a result of waves coming up over the roads," Clouser said. There's enough power in those big waves to alter the landscape. "The larger waves do have that ability to wash away sand and erode the beaches," Clouser said. Although wave heights will begin subsiding and a warning expires Friday, about 12 hours before the strongest parts of the storm arrive, rough seas will stick around. "Just because the warning ends, does not mean that wave conditions are safe, we still are expecting to see larger heights continuing into the weekend," Clouser said. While witnessing the spectacle of nature's fury can be enticing, Clouser urges people to pass, and if they won't, to use extreme caution. "Give it a healthly distance. And if you see somebody in the water or for example, a dog gets loose and into the water, do not go into the water by any means, call 911 and wait for a professional rescue," Clouser said.

title: WEATHER EXTRA: One more day of gloomy weather
text: WEATHER EXTRA: One more day of gloomy weather Published: Dec. 29, 2023 at 8:09 AM EST|Updated: 47 minutes ago LANSING, Mich. author: archyworldyscom
title: Kim Jong-un calls security meeting to address drone crisis
text:
On Monday, North Korean leader <a href="https://www.archyworldys.com/we-do-not-have-any-hostile-intentions-towards-pyongyang/" title="We do not have “any hostile intentions” towards Pyongyang »”>Kim Jong-un chaired a meeting with top national security officials to analyze the situation generated by South Korean drones detected by Pyongyang in its airspace, which contribute to further aggravating the situation on the peninsula. .
Kim called a meeting in Pyongyang between the new Minister of National Defense, No Kwang-chol, the chief of staff of the Korean People’s Army (KPA), Ri Yong-gil, and Jo Chun-ryong, of which he is a member of Central Committee of the Workers’ Party, according to state news agency KCNA .
Also present were the Deputy Chief of Staff and Director of the General Reconnaissance Office (responsible for military intelligence operations), Ri Chang-ho, and the Minister of State Security (responsible for the North Korean secret police), Ri Chang-dae , as well as commanders of military units, including artillery or electronic warfare.
Kim listened to a series of reports, including a military response plan and intelligence and weapons reports, and “evaluated the data” to determine “important tasks ahead” in terms of deterrence and for “the exercise of the right to ‘national autonomy’. defense.”
The KCNA report comes just hours after the North Korean leader’s sister, Kim Yo-jong , published a statement directly accusing the South Korean military of being behind the shipment of unmanned aircraft.
“We know without a doubt that the main culprit in the drone intrusion incident in Pyongyang is the riffraff in the military environment of the Republic of Korea (the South’s official name),” he said.
However, the South Korean military denied its participation in these actions after North Korea said on October 11 that the South had sent drones carrying anti-regime propaganda leaflets that flew over Pyongyang at least three times in the past week .
He also published photos of drones in the night sky of the capital and photos of flyers, which report that the cost of the watch Kim Jong-un wears or one of his daughter’s coats would allow them to be purchased in large quantities . of food.
It is believed that those responsible for these actions may be activist groups who regularly send balloons with this type of propaganda to the North, to which Pyongyang has responded by sending more than 5,000 balloons containing rubbish to the South since May.
The aforementioned activist groups ensured that on some occasions they even managed to send drones loaded with brochures to North Korea.
#Kim #Jongun #calls #security #meeting #address #drone #crisis

author: ben@gamereactor.es (Ben Lyons)
title: PUBG: Battlegrounds deja de ser compatible con PS4 y Xbox One.
text:
PUBG: Battlegrounds deja de ser compatible con PS4 y Xbox One.
La versión para consola pronto será sólo una experiencia de la actual generación.
A pesar de que todavía hay un gran número de jugadores que utilizan con frecuencia una PlayStation 4 y una Xbox One, ahora que ya llevamos casi cinco años de la actual generación de hardware, estamos viendo cómo cada vez más desarrolladores y editores se alejan de las consolas de última generación. Esto se debe en parte a poder adaptar los juegos y mejorarlos en la medida que permite el hardware más reciente, viéndolos florecer en sistemas más modernos. El último de ellos es Krafton y PUBG: Battlegrounds Team, que ha revelado que el battle royale está dejando de ser compatible con PS4 y Xbox One.
En una entrada de blog, se revela que el 13 de noviembre, PUBG en consola dejará de ser compatible con PS4 y Xbox One, y que en su lugar sólo estará disponible en PS5 y Xbox Series X/S. La razón se explica así:
"Este cambio es un paso necesario para alinear PUBG en consola con las consolas de generación actual. Para ofrecer a nuestros jugadores un entorno de gameplay más estable en consola y garantizar una experiencia más fluida y sin interrupciones con futuras actualizaciones, hemos decidido realizar la transición a las consolas de generación actual. Tras esta transición, los jugadores de consola verán mejoras visuales y velocidades de fotogramas más estables. Además, esperamos reducir los continuos problemas de bloqueo mediante optimizaciones relacionadas con la memoria".
A diferencia de algunos juegos que van dejando de funcionar de forma constante, PUBG simplemente no podrá descargarse ni jugarse en PS4/Xbox One a partir del 13 de noviembre, lo que significa que si eres jugador de PUBG en consola, tienes unos tres meses para pasar a la última hornada de consolas y seguir cazando Cenas de Pollo.
Tras la transición, podemos esperar que las ediciones de PS5 y Xbox Series X/S tengan especificaciones actualizadas que afecten a la resolución y a la velocidad de fotogramas. En breve, podemos esperar que el juego tenga el siguiente rendimiento en los sistemas de actual generación.
Xbox Serie S:
- Resolución - 1080p/1440p
- FPS - 60fps/30fps
Xbox Serie X:
- Resolución - 2160p
- FPS - 60fps
PS5:
- Resolución - 1440p
- FPS - 60fps
PS5 Pro:
- Resolución - 2160p
- FPS - 60fps
Hay que decir que la Xbox Serie X y la PS5 Pro (pero no la PS5) también soportarán resolución 4K dinámica.
El desarrollador concluye con: "Como se ha mencionado antes, esta transición a las consolas de generación actual no solo tiene como objetivo proporcionar un entorno más estable, sino también prepararnos para actualizaciones mayores en el futuro. Supone un importante paso adelante para el crecimiento a largo plazo de PUBG Console, y nos permitirá responder más rápidamente a las necesidades cambiantes del ecosistema de las consolas".
PUBG: Battlegrounds
- Plataforma: PC, PS4, Stadia, Xbox One
- Género:
Acción - Desarrollador:
Bluehole Studio,Brendan Greene,PUBG Corp - Editor:
Inc.,Bluehole - Jugadores online: 1-100
- Fecha de lanzamiento: 20 Diciembre 2017
Leer análisis

author: 关注
title: 赛默飞 2025 年上半年业绩出炉，利润同比增长8.5%
text:
赛默飞 2025 年上半年业绩出炉，利润同比增长8.5%
7月23日，赛默飞世尔科技公布了截至2025年6月28日的第二季度财务业绩。
2025 年第二季度收入108.5 亿美元，较 2024 年第二季度的 105.4 亿美元，增长 3% 。净利润16.2亿美元，较2024年同期的15.5亿美元，同比增长4.5%。
2025年上半年收入212.2亿美元，较2024年上半年的208.9亿美元，增长1.6%。净收入31.30亿美元，较2024年的28.85亿美元，同比增长8.5%。
第二季度亮点
第二季度收入增长 3% 至 108.5 亿美元。
第二季度 GAAP 摊薄后每股收益 （EPS） 增长 6% 至 4.28 美元。
第二季度调整后每股收益为 5.36 美元。
在本季度，推进了我们行之有效的增长战略，推出了一系列高影响力创新，加强了我们行业领先的商业引擎，并加深了我们在客户中值得信赖的合作伙伴地位，以实现科学突破并最大限度地提高客户生产力。亮点包括：
推出下一代仪器，包括Thermo Scientific™ Orbitrap™ Astral™ Zoom 质谱仪、Thermo Scientific™ Orbitrap™ Excedion™ Pro 质谱仪和Thermo Scientific™ Krios™ 5 Cryo-TEM。这些仪器帮助研究人员加深对复杂疾病的理解，推进精准医学，并促进新疗法的开发。我们还扩展了用于药物生产的DynaDrive™一次性生物反应器产品组合，包括首创的新型台秤系统，从而实现了有意义的工作流程效率，并实现了从台式到商业化的无缝放大。
塔夫茨中心的一项研究进一步验证了加速器™药物开发解决方案的显着优势，该研究表明，我们的集成 CDMO 和 CRO 产品可以显着缩短开发时间并为客户提供强大的投资回报率。
2025 年第二季度
2025 年第二季度收入增长 3% 至 108.5 亿美元，而 2024 年第二季度为 105.4 亿美元。有机收入增长 2%。净利润16.2亿美元，较2024年同期的15.5亿美元，同比增长4.5%。
GAAP 收益结果
2025 年第二季度 GAAP 摊薄每股收益为 4.28 美元，而 2024 年第二季度为 4.04 美元。2025 年第二季度 GAAP 营业收入为 18.3 亿美元，而上年同期为 18.2 亿美元。GAAP 营业利润率为 16.9%，而 2024 年第二季度为 17.3%。
非公认会计准则收益结果
2025 年第二季度调整后每股收益为 5.36 美元，而 2024 年第二季度为 5.37 美元。2025 年第二季度调整后营业收入为 23.8 亿美元，而去年同期为 23.5 亿美元。调整后营业利润率为 21.9%，而 2024 年第二季度为 22.3%。
近五年趋势
从近五年Q2的业绩表现来看，整体呈现增长后平稳运行的态势。其中，在2022年Q2，较2021年同期实现18.3%的营收增长。2022年-2025 年 Q2 业绩平稳。2025年Q2较 2024 年同期略有增长，总营收与归母净利润均同比提升。
分业务部门：
生命科学解决方案收入25.0亿美元，占比总收入的23.0%。利润9.2亿美元，利润率36.8%。
分析仪器收入17.3亿美元，占比总收入的15.9%，利润3.3亿美元，利润率18.8%。
专业诊断收入11.3亿美元，占比总收入的10.4%，利润3.1亿美元，利润率27.0%。
实验室产品和生物制药服务收入60.0亿美元，占比总收入的55.2%，利润8.3亿美元，利润率13.8%。
上半年业绩
2025年上半年营收212.2亿美元，较2024年上半年的208.9亿美元增长1.6%。净收入31.30亿美元，较2024年的28.85亿美元同比增长8.5%。
分业务部门：
2025年上半年各业务部门营收较2024年上半年均增加。
生命科学解决方案收入48.4亿美元，占比总收入22.8%。利润17.5亿美元，利润率36.2%。
分析仪器收入34.5亿美元，占比总收入的16.2%，利润7.24亿美元，利润率21.0%。
专业诊断收入22.8亿美元，占比总收入的10.8%，利润6.1亿美元，利润率26.7%。
实验室产品和生物制药服务收入116.4亿美元，占比总收入的54.8%，利润15.6亿美元，利润率13.4%。
赛默飞世尔科技董事长、总裁兼首席执行官 Marc N. Casper 表示，“我们卓越的团队继续以高水平执行，在应对宏观环境的同时帮助客户取得成功。在 PPI 业务系统的支持下，我们组织的敏捷性使我们能够有效地适应当前的市场状况，积极管理我们的成本基础，并在第二季度取得强劲的运营业绩。”
Casper补充道：“我们值得信赖的合作伙伴地位与客户产生了强烈的共鸣，使我们能够继续推动市场份额的增长，并突显了我们帮助他们在所有市场环境中取得成功的独特能力。今年过半，我们取得了非常好的进展，这使我们能够很好地兑现 2025 年的承诺，同时为我们的公司建设更光明的未来。”

author: Yahoo Life Shopping
title: Putin ally dies falling from house window, latest in spate of mysterious Russian deaths
text:
Fox News Putin ally dies falling from house window, latest in spate of mysterious Russian deaths Michael Dorgan December 28, 2023 at 9:55 PM · 2 min read 1 Link Copied Read full article Putin ally dies falling from house window, latest in spate of mysterious Russian deaths Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again later. More content below
A Russian lawmaker and ally of President Vladimir Putin was found dead under mysterious circumstances Wednesday after falling from the third floor of his home, Russian state media has reported.
Vladimir Egorov, 46, who was a member of Putin's ruling United Russia party, plunged 30 feet to his death at his home in the town of Tobolsk, located in the western Siberian region of Tyumen Oblast. Media outlet Baza reported on its Telegram channel that Egorov’s body was discovered Wednesday afternoon in the courtyard of a house and that police are investigating what caused his death.
Vladimir Egorov, left, an ally of Russian President Vladimir Putin, is the latest prominent Russian figure to die under mysterious circumstances after he fell to his death from the third floor of his home.
RUSSIAN OIL EXECUTIVE WHO CRITICIZED UKRAINE INVASION DEAD AFTER REPORTEDLY FALLING OUT OF HOSPITAL WINDOW
Russian news agency TASS also reported that Egorov had fallen to his death, citing an investigative department from the Tyumen region.
Fox News Digital reached out to Russia’s Ministry for Foreign Affairs to confirm the reports but did not immediately receive a response.
The New York Post, citing the 72 news outlet, reported that Egorov may have suffered from heart problems before the deadly fall.
READ ON THE FOX NEWS APP
Egorov, who was also a lawyer, was forced out of the city administration in 2016 following a corruption scandal for which he was not convicted, according to the New York Post. He then returned to the political fray.
Many other notable figures in Russia have died from falls since the beginning of the war with Ukraine.
In June, Kristina Baikova, a 28-year-old glamorous vice president of a Russian bank, fell from her 11th floor apartment, while in February, senior Russian military officer Marina Yankina plummeted 16 stories to her death in St Petersburg.
In September 2022, Ravil Maganov, the chairman of Russia's Lukoil oil giant, died after falling from a sixth-floor hospital window in Moscow.
CLICK TO GET THE FOX NEWS APP
Meanwhile, in August, Wagner mercenary leader Yevgeny Prigozhin and several of his top lieutenants died when their jet crashed halfway between Moscow and St. Petersburg.
In May, Russia's deputy science minister Pyotr Kucherenko, who had allegedly been a private critic of the invasion of Ukraine , died suddenly after falling seriously ill on a flight to Moscow.
In April, top energy boss Igor Shkurko was found dead in his prison cell after he was accused of taking a bribe.
Original article source: Putin ally dies falling from house window, latest in spate of mysterious Russian deaths

author: Guardian Nigeria
title: Ogun to tackle transportation challenges with alternate energy sources | The Guardian Nigeria News - Nigeria and World News — Features — The Guardian Nigeria News – Nigeria and World News
text: Ogun to tackle transportation challenges with alternate energy sources Ogun State Governor, Prince Dapo Abiodun, said the state has continued to set the pace for sustainable transportation systems with the use of alternative sources of energy. The governor disclosed this while declaring open the 18th National Council of Transportation conference, to be held at the June 12 Cultural Centre, Abeokuta. Speaking on the theme of the conference, ‘Enhancing Innovations and Technologies for Sustainable Transportation: Tackling The Energy Challenges’, Abiodun, represented by the Commissioner for Transportation, Olugbenga Dairo, said that the theme of the conference was apt as the country is currently facing a serious energy challenge occasioned by the removal of fuel subsidy, which has a spiral effect on transportation and other associated utilities. He noted that before the federal government rolled out plans for the compressed natural gas (CNG) project, Ogun state had taken the initiative of rolling out the CNG-compliant vehicles to support the green environment, mitigate global warming and ease the transportation burden faced by the public. Abiodun added that other alternative sources of energy, which include electric trucks and motorbikes, would soon be launched in the state. He said the Multi-Modal Transport Master Plan of the state created a vista of opportunities for residents and travellers and has enhanced business developments across all strata with a cargo airport at Iperu, an inland dry port at Papalanto to cater to the needs of the ever-growing industrial hubs across the state. He enjoined participants to build on the potential inherent in cross-fertilization of ideas, innovations, technologies, noting that at the end of the conference, states across the country would have developed a new model in arresting the energy crisis. Also speaking, Permanent Secretary, Federal Ministry of Transportation, Michael Oloruntola, expressed appreciation to the state government for hosting the conference, saying the choice of Abeokuta was symbolic, as it has the cultural and historical tapestry that binds the country together. Oloruntola said that the conference sought to uphold the prioritisation of innovative technologies that enhanced affordability, accessibility, safety, security and environmental sustainability. 0 Comments [cancel reply](/features/travel/ogun-to-tackle-transportation-challenges-with-alternate-energy-sources/#respond) You must be [logged in](https://guardian.ng/wp-login.php?redirect_to=https%3A%2F%2Fguardian.ng%2Ffeatures%2Ftravel%2Fogun-to-tackle-transportation-challenges-with-alternate-energy-sources%2F) to post a comment.
